abstract: Michael Eisner, the former Walt Disney chief who now runs his own investment firm, on Tuesday downplayed reports that he is being considered to head up the Tribune Company when the media firm exits bankruptcy protection.
snippet: Michael Eisner, the former Walt Disney chief who now runs his own investment firm, on Tuesday downplayed reports that he is being considered to head up the Tribune Company when the media firm exits bankruptcy protection.
lead_paragraph: Michael Eisner, the former Walt Disney chief who now runs his own investment firm, on Tuesday downplayed reports that he is being considered to head up the Tribune Company when the media firm exits bankruptcy protection.

headline.main: Eisner Downplays Reports He May Run Tribune
